meanings.sent1: The king was beknighting the brave warrior for his valor in battle.
meanings.sent2: The queen will be beknighting the young squire at the ceremony tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The wizard accidentally beknighted the castle cat with a toy sword.
meanings.sent4: The sun's rays seemed to be beknighting the entire forest with golden light.
meanings.sent5: The magical sword glowed with power as it began beknighting the chosen hero.

meanings.definition: The act of conferring knighthood on someone.
meanings.sent1: The beknighting of the young page was a grand event in the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The ceremony for the beknighting of the nobleman was attended by many guests.
meanings.sent3: The beknighting of the jester brought laughter and joy to the court.
meanings.sent4: The beknighting of the princess turned her into a symbol of bravery and honor.
meanings.sent5: The beknighting of the knight's squire marked the beginning of his own journey to knighthood.
